title: The Island of Dr Moreau
creator_credit: New Line Cinema, Edward Pressman and John Frankenheimer
brief_description: Dr. Moreau is brilliant geneticist on the brink of superseding evolution. When a UN diplomat visits the island laboratory he discovers experiments turning animal life forms into human-like beasts. The beasts revolt, threatening not only the island but ultimately all mankind.

constellations_other.name: Doctors of Evil
constellations_other.description: Villains get all the best lines and if they're mad scientists, they get all the best toys too. Evil Dr Ironstein from Flight of the Amazon Queen is one member of long lineage of science supervillains.

creator_credit_for_label: New Line Cinema, Edward Pressman and John Frankenheimer
description: Dr. Moreau is brilliant geneticist on the brink of superseding evolution. When a UN diplomat visits the island laboratory he discovers experiments turning animal life forms into human-like beasts. The beasts revolt, threatening not only the island but ultimately all mankind. Adapted from the H.G. Wells story. Cast includes Val Kilmer, Marlon Brando, David Thewlis, Fairuza Balk, Ron Perlman, Temuera Morrison.
